formula.name: 5th Burning Ship Partial
formula.reference: Xrn = abs(Xr) * (Xr2 * Xr2 - 10 * Xr2 * Xi2 + 5 * Xi2 * Xi2) + Cr; Xin = Xi * (5 * Xr2 * Xr2 - 10 * Xr2 * Xi2 + Xi2 * Xi2) + Ci;
formula.perturbation: xrn = diffabs(Xr, xr) * (Xr2 * Xr2 - 10 * Xr2 * Xi2 + 5 * Xi2 * Xi2) + abs(Xr + xr) * (4 * Xr2 * Xr * xr + 6 * Xr2 * xr2 + 4 * Xr * xr2 * xr + xr2 * xr2 - 20 * Xr2 * Xi * xi - 10 * Xr2 * xi2 - 20 * Xr * xr * Xi2 - 40 * Xr * xr * Xi * xi - 20 * Xr * xr * xi2 - 10 * xr2 * Xi2 - 20 * xr2 * Xi * xi - 10 * xr2 * xi2 + 20 * Xi2 * Xi * xi + 30 * Xi2 * xi2 + 20 * Xi * xi2 * xi + 5 * xi2 * xi2) + cr; xin = 20 * Xi * Xr2 * Xr * xr + 30 * Xi * Xr2 * xr2 + 20 * Xi * Xr * xr2 * xr + 5 * Xi * xr2 * xr2 - 30 * Xi2 * Xr2 * xi - 30 * Xi * Xr2 * xi2 - 20 * Xi2 * Xi * Xr * xr - 60 * Xi2 * Xr * xr * xi - 60 * Xi * Xr * xr * xi2 - 10 * Xi2 * Xi * xr2 - 30 * Xi2 * xr2 * xi - 30 * Xi * xr2 * xi2 + 5 * Xi2 * Xi2 * xi + 10 * Xi2 * Xi * xi2 + 10 * Xi2 * xi2 * xi + 5 * Xi * xi2 * xi2 + 5 * xi * Xr2 * Xr2 + 20 * xi * Xr2 * Xr * xr + 30 * xi * Xr2 * xr2 + 20 * xi * Xr * xr2 * xr + 5 * xi * xr2 * xr2 - 10 * xi2 * xi * Xr2 - 20 * xi2 * xi * Xr * xr - 10 * xi2 * xi * xr2 + xi2 * xi2 * xi + ci;
